name: Bored Puzzles: Jigsaw Puzzle 1 Badge - old

metadata.name: Bored Puzzles Jigsaw1 Badge
metadata.description: This NFT Badge belongs to the Bored Puzzles Jigsaw Puzzle Genesis Edition, the very first of its kind. This piece is the final image of a Jigsaw Puzzle that was assembled in a Webapp Game, over at https://www.boredpuzzles.com. Owners of this piece have proven themselves worthy of completing the task.
